title: Please help me ID these Retro Sport Team fonts
content:
Hi, I'd like to know if anybody can identify these 2 fonts?  
I'm a noobie at font identifying and the online ID sites couldn't find an exact match.  
Any close font ID's are welcomed as well. Thanks!

- Pat

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819062727im_/http:/typophile.com/files/la_4410.jpg)
author: TrickStarr92

comments.content: [Tartine Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819062727/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_tartine_script_pro_regular/) might do for a similar. not quite as retro/simple but it's something.
Very helpful info. Thank you Defiantone!
